data.text:
Sir David Richard Llewellyn, 1st Bt.1

M, #69841, b. 9 March 1879, d. 15 December 1940

Last Edited=21 Apr 2014

Sir David Richard Llewellyn, 1st Bt. was born on 9 March 1879.2 He was the son of Rees Llewellyn and Elizabeth Llewellyn.2 He married Magdalene Anne Harries, daughter of Reverend Henry Harries, on 19 April 1905.2 He died on 15 December 1940 at age 61.2

He graduated with a Doctor of Law (LL.D.)2 He was vice-chairman of Amalgamated Anthracite Colleries Ltd.2 He was chairman of Welsh Associated Colleries Ltd.2 He was created 1st Baronet Llewellyn, of Bwllfa, Aberdare, co. Glamorgan [U.K.] on 31 January 1922.2 He was chairman of North's Navigation Colleries (1889) Ltd.2 He was chairman of Graigola Merthyr Company.2 He held the office of Justice of the Peace (J.P.) for Glamorgan.2 He was a director of GKN.2 He lived at Bwllfa, Aberdare, Glamorgan, Wales .3

Children of Sir David Richard Llewellyn, 1st Bt. and Magdalene Anne Harries

Sir Rhys Llewellyn, 2nd Bt.2 b. 9 Mar 1910, d. 25 Apr 1978

Sir Henry Morton Llewellyn, 3rd Bt.+ b. 18 Jul 1911, d. 15 Nov 1999

Margaret Elaine Llewellyn+1 b. 7 Mar 1913

Elizabeth Aileen Maud Llewellyn+2 b. 9 Oct 1914

Sir David Treharne Llewellyn+2 b. 17 Jan 1916, d. 9 Aug 1992

Marjorie Joyce Llewellyn+4 b. 22 Mar 1917, d. 24 Oct 1971

Major William Herbert Rhydian Llewellyn+2 b. 8 Jul 1919, d. 29 May 2008

Magdalene Clare Llewellyn+2 b. 3 Feb 1922, d. 21 Apr 1999

Magdalene Anne Harries1

F, #69842, d. 1 February 1966

Last Edited=21 Apr 2014

Magdalene Anne Harries was the daughter of Reverend Henry Harries.1 She married Sir David Richard Llewellyn, 1st Bt., son of Rees Llewellyn and Elizabeth Llewellyn, on 19 April 1905.1 She died on 1 February 1966.1

Her married name became Llewellyn.

Children of Magdalene Anne Harries and Sir David Richard Llewellyn, 1st Bt.

Sir Rhys Llewellyn, 2nd Bt.1 b. 9 Mar 1910, d. 25 Apr 1978

Sir Henry Morton Llewellyn, 3rd Bt.+1 b. 18 Jul 1911, d. 15 Nov 1999

Gunhild Balck1

F, #69844, b. 11 December 1889, d. 1985

Last Edited=12 Sep 2020

Gunhild Balck was born on 11 December 1889.2 She was the daughter of Maj.-Gen. Sir Victor Gustaf Balck.3 She married James St. Vincent Broke Saumarez, 5th Baron de Saumarez, son of James St. Vincent Saumarez, 4th Baron Saumarez and Jane Anne Vere-Broke, on 30 April 1914.1 She died in 1985.1

Her married name became Saumarez. After her marriage, Gunhild Balck was styled as Baroness de Saumarez on 25 April 1937.

Children of Gunhild Balck and James St. Vincent Broke Saumarez, 5th Baron de Saumarez

Hon. Veronica Saumarez+3 b. 21 Jun 1915, d. 6 Dec 2002

Hon. Christine Saumarez+3 b. 31 Jul 1916, d. 20 Apr 1998

Hon. Philip St. Vincent Saumarez3 b. 17 Nov 1917, d. 15 Dec 1935

James Victor Broke Saumarez, 6th Baron de Saumarez+3 b. 28 Apr 1924, d. 20 Jan 1991

Olivia Anna Christina Llewellyn1

F, #69846, b. 1980

Last Edited=16 Oct 2021

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Olivia Anna Christina Llewellyn was born in 1980.1 She is the daughter of Sir David St. Vincent Llewellyn, 4th Bt. and Vanessa Mary Teresa Hubbard.1

Arabella Dominica Llewellyn1

F, #69847, b. 1983

Last Edited=23 Jul 2014

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Arabella Dominica Llewellyn was born in 1983.1 She is the daughter of Sir David St. Vincent Llewellyn, 4th Bt. and Vanessa Mary Teresa Hubbard.1 She married Thomas Burwell on 12 July 2014 at St. Mary's Church, Easton, Hampshire, England.2

From 12 July 2014, her married name became Burwell.2

Gabriella Zanna Vanessa Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe1

F, #69848, b. 1989

Last Edited=24 Oct 2014

Consanguinity Index=0.02%

Gabriella Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe 2

Gabriella Zanna Vanessa Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe was born in 1989.1 She is the daughter of John Austen Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe and Vanessa Mary Teresa Hubbard.1 She married Alan Pownall on 13 September 2014 at Tellaro, Liguria, Italy.3

Gabriella Zanna Vanessa Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe used the stage-name of Gabriella Wilde.4 From 13 September 2014, her married name became Pownall.3

Child of Gabriella Zanna Vanessa Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe and Alan Pownall

Sasha Blue Pownall4 b. 3 Feb 2014

Last Edited=2 Dec 2005

Octavia Elsa Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe was born on 27 October 1991 at Winchester, Hampshire, England .1,2 She is the daughter of John Austen Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe and Vanessa Mary Teresa Hubbard.1
